projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Share your place
projects.bodyText:
- Website login signup and share your favorite place. All it's record on MongoDb
 - Edit, delete, and view on google maps.

projects.title: Sports Nft
projects.bodyText:
- Website for create your Sport profil with web3auth .
 - Stock your license and grade, result of competition.
 - Sports club have information but you are owner.

projects.title: Project Music
projects.bodyText:
- Template about music, classic website.
 - Option to select class **slots** and **custom time**.
 - Option to put on Vibrate instead of Silent.

projects.title: Chalets et Caviar
projects.bodyText:
- This website is for a real estate agency.
 - I had to add and configure a real estate plug-in.
 - Pay attention to SEO and explain to the team how to modify their ad and profile.
